alert.note: Alert for Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:17PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 600 PM MST... At 517 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Claypool, or 17 miles north of Globe, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sawmill and Hilltop. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 264 and 287. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
